list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept, especially in a particular kind of language or branch of study.
a fixed or limited period for which something, e.g., office, imprisonment, or investment, lasts or is intended to last.
each of the periods in the year, alternating with holidays or vacations, during which instruction is given in a school, college, or university, or during which a court holds sessions.
conditions under which an action may be undertaken or agreement reached; stipulated or agreed-upon requirements.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he could only be dealt with on his own terms
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta chỉ có thể được xử lý theo cách riêng của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the quantities in a ratio, series, or mathematical expression.
give a descriptive name to; call by a specified name.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has been termed the father of modern theology
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã được gọi là cha đẻ của thần học hiện đại
